mapper.insert: insert into sys_role (ROLE_NAME, REMARK, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF) values (#{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select ROLE_ID as value, ROLE_NAME as name from sys_role order by ROLE_ID asc
